articles.title: Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, and JPMorgan Chase Had Huge Bond Sales - Barron's
articles.description: The three bank's successful bond sales could make it easier for banks to pay dividends and increase buybacks later this year.

articles.title: Stanford launches pediatric Pfizer vaccine trial that will include children as young as 6 months - KABC-TV
